data.title: The Artist’s Way The Basic Tools
data.text:
LEARN THE BEDROCK TOOLS OF A CREATIVE RECOVERY

Join Julia Cameron, author of the groundbreaking book The Artist’s Way, and learn the primary tools that will launch you into creative renewal. A spiritual guide to the creative process, The Artist’s Way unleashed a revolution of creative recovery around the world—one that that has only become more important in our distracted and chaotic times. Julia is credited with helping millions of people find and express authentic creativity in their lives.

Join her live in this one-night, online program as she covers the core concepts from her groundbreaking creativity course, including the three bedrock tools of a creative recovery: Morning Pages, Artist Dates, and Walks.

This class is for everyone who is yearning for a more creative life, whether you consider yourself an artist or not.

Recommended reading Julia Cameron, The Artist’s Way
